siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Based on Codeforces, Game of Codes is all about competitive programming, be it practicing, analyzing, learning, or even doing contests with your friends! This is full in one package for Codeforces lovers, and have 2000+ users registered and growing.
blogPost.body: Based on Codeforces, Game of Codes is all about competitive programming, be it practicing, analyzing, learning, or even doing contests with your friends! This is full in one package for Codeforces lovers, and have 2000+ users registered and growing.
blogPost.title: Game Of Codes - Level up your code
blogPost.author: Abhinandan Sharma

localize.description: 基于Codeforces，Game of Codes是一款关于竞技编程的游戏，无论是练习、分析、学习，甚至是和你的朋友一起做比赛都是如此! 这是为Codeforces爱好者提供的全套服务，目前已有2000+用户注册，并在不断增长。
基於Codeforces，Game of Codes是一款關於競技編程的遊戲，無論是練習、分析、學習，甚至是和你的朋友一起做比賽都是如此! 這是爲Codeforces愛好者提供的全套服務，目前已有2000+用戶註冊，並在不斷增長。

previous.excerpt: Quicksize gives you your exact size in the brand and model of your choice based on what you already have in your closet. Coming on Apple and Android soon!
previous.title: Quicksize - Never order the wrong size again

localize.description: Quicksize根据您衣柜里已有的衣服，为您提供您所选择的品牌和型号的准确尺寸。即将在苹果和安卓上推出
Quicksize根據您衣櫃裏已有的衣服，爲您提供您所選擇的品牌和型號的準確尺寸。即將在蘋果和安卓上推出

next.excerpt: Browser Stealth Mode is a chrome extension that lets you browse and watch anything without worrying about who's looking over your shoulder. You can toggle stealth mode in your current tab. Stealth mode includes grayscale, hiding images/videos, and muting tab.
next.title: Browser Stealth Mode - Disguise your internet browsing activities

localize.description: 浏览器隐身模式是一个chrome扩展，让你浏览和观看任何东西，而不用担心谁在看你的肩膀。你可以在当前标签中切换隐身模式。隐身模式包括灰度、隐藏图片/视频和静音标签。
localize.tagline: 掩饰您的互联网浏览活动

localize.description: 瀏覽器隱身模式是一個chrome擴展，讓你瀏覽和觀看任何東西，而不用擔心誰在看你的肩膀。你可以在當前標籤中切換隱身模式。隱身模式包括灰度、隱藏圖片/視頻和靜音標籤。
localize.tagline: 掩飾您的互聯網瀏覽活動
